Symbol.Script_3D:
! Cooling Tower
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 ENDIF
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN END
res = 24 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN res = 8 ! Simple
IF useSysMat THEN MainBoxMaterial = sMat MATERIAL MainBoxMaterial
PEN gs_cont_pen RESOL res
operatedMode = 0 addStatus = 0 IF GLOB_CONTEXT > 40 AND GLOB_CONTEXT < 50 THEN operatedMode = 1 addStatus = 3 ENDIF
IF mbShow THEN
! --- HOTSPOTS --- !
unID = 1 HOTSPOT A/2, B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, -B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, -B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, B/2, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, ZZYZX, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, B/2, ZZYZX-cylindHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT A/2, -B/2, ZZYZX-cylindHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, -B/2, ZZYZX-cylindHeight, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -A/2, B/2, ZZYZX-cylindHeight, unID: unID=unID+1
! --- MAIN BOX --- !
IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN
ADD -A/2+edgeThick, -B/2+edgeThick, 0 BLOCK A-edgeThick*2, B-edgeThick*2, toeHeight DEL 1
ADD -A/2, -B/2, toeHeight BLOCK A, B, edgeHeight DEL 1
num = MAX(1, INT(midHeight/2.50)) midSHeight = midHeight/num FOR j = 1 TO num ADDz toeHeight+edgeHeight+midSHeight*(j-1) ROTx 90 ADDz -B/2+edgeThick+0.10 PRISM_ 5, B-edgeThick*2-0.20, A/2-0.25, 0, 15, A/2-edgeThick, midSHeight-0.15, 15, -A/2+edgeThick, midSHeight-0.15, 15, -A/2+0.25, 0, 15, A/2-0.25, 0, -1 DEL 2
ROTz 90 ROTx 90 ADDz -A/2+edgeThick PRISM_ 9, A-edgeThick*2, B/2-edgeThick, 0, 15, B/2-edgeThick, midSHeight, 15, -B/2+edgeThick, midSHeight, 15, -B/2+edgeThick, 0, 15, -B/2+edgeThick+0.10, 0, 15, -B/2+edgeThick+0.10, midSHeight-0.15, 15, B/2-edgeThick-0.10, midSHeight-0.15, 15, B/2-edgeThick-0.10, 0, 15, B/2-edgeThick, 0, -1 DEL 4 NEXT j
num = 5 IF A > 6 THEN num = INT((A-edgeThick*2)/1.1) dist = (A-edgeThick*2)/num FOR i = 1 TO num-1 ADD -A/2+edgeThick+dist*i, -B/2+edgeThick, toeHeight+edgeHeight PRISM_ 4, midHeight, 0.06, 0, 15, 0, -edgeThick, 15, -0.06, 0, 15, 0.06, 0, -1 DEL 1
ADD -A/2+edgeThick+dist*i, B/2-edgeThick, toeHeight+edgeHeight PRISM_ 4, midHeight, 0.06, 0, 15, 0, edgeThick, 15, -0.06, 0, 15, 0.06, 0, -1 DEL 1 NEXT i
ADD -A/2, -B/2, toeHeight+edgeHeight+midHeight BLOCK A, B, edgeHeight DEL 1
ADDz ZZYZX-cylindHeight EXTRUDE 2, 0, 0, cylindHeight, addStatus+16+32, 0, 0, 901, cylindRadius, 360, 4001 ADDz cylindHeight IF operatedMode < EPS THEN GOSUB 500 DEL 2
ELSE ADD -A/2+edgeThick, -B/2+edgeThick, 0 BLOCK A-edgeThick*2, B-edgeThick*2, toeHeight DEL 1
ADD -A/2, -B/2, toeHeight BLOCK A, B, edgeHeight*2+midHeight DEL 1
ADDz ZZYZX-cylindHeight CYLIND cylindHeight, cylindRadius DEL 1 ENDIF ELSE ADD -A/2, -B/2, ZZYZX/2 RECT A, B DEL 1 ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, cShow3D = 1, gs_ConMat = MainBoxMaterial, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show_3D = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConPosZ_1=ConPosZ_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConEdit_1 = 15, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConPosZ_2=ConPosZ_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConEdit_2 = 15, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConPosZ_3=ConPosZ_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConEdit_3 = 12 END
500: SegmetAng = 360/SegmentsNum SegmetHalfAng = SegmetAng/2 TotalInsideRad = Rad-HalfThick/TAN(SegmetHalfAng)-Thick DivisionInsideDist = (TotalInsideRad-Thick*(DivisionNum-1))/DivisionNum
ROTz SegmetHalfAng
PUT 0, 0, 901 PUT Rad, 360, 4001
alpha = 0 FOR i = 1 TO SegmentsNum InsideDist = DivisionInsideDist CenterPointPosX = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha) CenterPointPosY = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha) FOR j = 1 TO DivisionNum InsideDist = InsideDist+Thick*(j>1) PointOnArcEndPosX = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)-(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha) PointOnArcEnd2PosX = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)+(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha) PointOnArcEndPosY = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha)+(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha) PointOnArcEnd2PosY = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha)-(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)
IF j = 1 THEN PUT CenterPointPosX, CenterPointPosY, 1 PUT PointOnArcEndPosX, PointOnArcEndPosY, 1 PUT 0, 0, 901 PUT PointOnArcEnd2PosX, PointOnArcEnd2PosY, 3001 PUT CenterPointPosX, CenterPointPosY, -1 ELSE InsideDist = InsideDist+DivisionInsideDist OPointOnArcEndPosX = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)-(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha) OPointOnArcEnd2PosX = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)+(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha) OPointOnArcEndPosY = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha)+(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha) OPointOnArcEnd2PosY = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha)-(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)
PUT PointOnArcEndPosX, PointOnArcEndPosY, 1 PUT 0, 0, 901 PUT PointOnArcEnd2PosX, PointOnArcEnd2PosY, 3001 PUT OPointOnArcEnd2PosX, OPointOnArcEnd2PosY, 1 PUT 0, 0, 901 PUT OPointOnArcEndPosX, OPointOnArcEndPosY, 3001 PUT PointOnArcEndPosX, PointOnArcEndPosY, -1 ENDIF NEXT j alpha = alpha+SegmetAng NEXT i
POLY_ NSP/3,
GET(NSP)
DEL 1 RETURN
Symbol.Script_2D:
! Cooling Tower
PEN gs_cont_pen SET FILL gs_fill_type
unID = 1 HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1
DrawingNum = 1 IF DrawingNum = 1 THEN ! Top
! --- MAIN BOX --- !
HOTSPOT2 A/2, B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 A/2, -B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2, -B/2, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -A/2, B/2, unID: unID=unID+1
SET FILL gs_fill_type
PEN gs_cont_pen IF gs_fill_pen THEN PEN gs_fill_pen PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 3+32, 4, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2, mbShow = 0 PEN gs_cont_pen PROJECT2{3} 3, 270, 2, 8, 0, 0, 0, 0, PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2, mbShow = 0
GOSUB 500 ENDIF
! --- OTHER VIEWS --- !
ROT2 -SYMB_ROTANGLE * (DrawingNum > 1 AND NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED))+SYMB_ROTANGLE * (DrawingNum > 1 AND SYMB_MIRRORED)
IF DrawingNum = 2 THEN PROJECT2 -3, 90, 2 ! Bottom IF DrawingNum = 3 THEN PROJECT2 4, 270, 2 ! Front IF DrawingNum = 4 THEN PROJECT2 4, 90, 2 ! Back IF DrawingNum = 5 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180*(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Right IF DrawingNum = 6 THEN PROJECT2 4, 180*NOT(SYMB_MIRRORED), 2 ! Left
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, MEP_NumConnectionData = gs_Connections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, DrawingNum = DrawingNum, MEP_InsShow = 0, MEP_cline_show = 0, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_fill_type=gs_fill_type, gs_fill_pen=gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen=gs_back_pen, ConPosX_1=ConPosX_1, ConPosY_1=ConPosY_1, ConLength_1=ConLength_1, ConShow_1 = 0, ConEdit_1 = 5, ConPosX_2=ConPosX_2, ConPosY_2=ConPosY_2, ConLength_2=ConLength_2, ConShow_2 = 0, ConEdit_2 = 5, ConPosX_3=ConPosX_3, ConPosY_3=ConPosY_3, ConLength_3=ConLength_3, ConShow_3 = 0, ConEdit_3 = 12 DEL 1
END
500: SegmetAng = 360/SegmentsNum SegmetHalfAng = SegmetAng/2 TotalInsideRad = Rad-HalfThick/TAN(SegmetHalfAng)-Thick DivisionInsideDist = (TotalInsideRad-Thick*(DivisionNum-1))/DivisionNum
ROT2 SegmetHalfAng
PUT 0, 0, 901 PUT Rad, 360, 4001
alpha = 0 FOR i = 1 TO SegmentsNum InsideDist = DivisionInsideDist CenterPointPosX = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha) CenterPointPosY = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha) FOR j = 1 TO DivisionNum InsideDist = InsideDist+Thick*(j>1) PointOnArcEndPosX = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)-(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha) PointOnArcEnd2PosX = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)+(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha) PointOnArcEndPosY = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha)+(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha) PointOnArcEnd2PosY = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha)-(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)
IF j = 1 THEN PUT CenterPointPosX, CenterPointPosY, 1 PUT PointOnArcEndPosX, PointOnArcEndPosY, 1 PUT 0, 0, 901 PUT PointOnArcEnd2PosX, PointOnArcEnd2PosY, 3001 PUT CenterPointPosX, CenterPointPosY, -1 ELSE InsideDist = InsideDist+DivisionInsideDist OPointOnArcEndPosX = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)-(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha) OPointOnArcEnd2PosX = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)+(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha) OPointOnArcEndPosY = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha)+(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha) OPointOnArcEnd2PosY = (HalfThick/SIN(SegmetHalfAng)+InsideDist*COS(SegmetHalfAng))*SIN(alpha)-(InsideDist*SIN(SegmetHalfAng))*COS(alpha)
PUT PointOnArcEndPosX, PointOnArcEndPosY, 1 PUT 0, 0, 901 PUT PointOnArcEnd2PosX, PointOnArcEnd2PosY, 3001 PUT OPointOnArcEnd2PosX, OPointOnArcEnd2PosY, 1 PUT 0, 0, 901 PUT OPointOnArcEndPosX, OPointOnArcEndPosY, 3001 PUT PointOnArcEndPosX, PointOnArcEndPosY, -1 ENDIF NEXT j alpha = alpha+SegmetAng NEXT i
POLY2_ NSP/3, 1,
GET(NSP)
DEL 1 RETURN
Symbol.Script_1D:
! Cooling Tower
EPS = 0.0001
! --- HARDCODED AND DERIVED VARIABLES --- !
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF B < 1.5 THEN B = 1.5 VALUES "B" RANGE [1.5, ] IF A < B*1.2 THEN A = B*1.2 VALUES "A" RANGE [B*1.2, ] ENDIF
toeHeight = 0.53 edgeHeight = 0.075 edgeThick = 0.05
cylindHeight = 0.35 cylindRadius = B/2-0.40
midHeight = ZZYZX-toeHeight-edgeHeight*2-cylindHeight
SegmentsNum = 6 DivisionNum = 3 IF cylindRadius > 1 THEN DivisionNum = 5 Thick = 0.04 HalfThick = Thick/2 Rad = cylindRadius
z = 0
PARAMETERS ac_toplevel = z PARAMETERS ac_bottomlevel = z
Symbol.Script_UI:
! Cooling Tower
UI_DIALOG `Специальные Параметры MEP`
DIM ui_vis_attr[4][4] FOR i = 1 TO 4 FOR j = 1 TO 4 ui_vis_attr[i][j] = 0 NEXT j NEXT i ui_vis_attr[1][1] = 2 ui_vis_attr[1][2] = 1 ui_vis_attr[1][3] = 7
ui_vis_attr[2][1] = 1 ui_vis_attr[2][2] = 237 ui_vis_attr[2][3] = 68 ui_vis_attr[2][4] = 14
DIM ui_con_type[3] ui_con_type[1] = 0 ui_con_type[2] = 0 ui_con_type[3] = 0
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS ALL ui_vis_attr = ui_vis_attr, ui_centerline_vars = 0, ui_con_type = ui_con_type, ui_system_var_pos = 2, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
Symbol.Script_VL:
! Cooling Tower
call "FM_types_MEP" parameters DIM shape_typ_to_validation[3] shape_typ_to_validation[1] = 0 ! Rectangle shape_typ_to_validation[2] = 1 ! Circle shape_typ_to_validation[3] = 0 ! Oval
IF GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" OR gs_detlevel_3D_m = -1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 ! Detailed IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 IF gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` THEN gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m ELSE IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Откл.` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` IF gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 THEN gs_detlevel_3D = `Детальный` PARAMETERS gs_detlevel_3D = gs_detlevel_3D ENDIF
VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D" `Детальный`,`Простой`,`Откл.` VALUES "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 2, 1, 0
! --- MAIN PARAMETERS --- !
IF SetProgram THEN LOCK "A", "B", "ZZYZX" ELSE IF ZZYZX < toeHeight+edgeHeight*2+cylindHeight+0.30 THEN ZZYZX = toeHeight+edgeHeight*2+cylindHeight+0.30 VALUES "ZZYZX" RANGE [toeHeight+edgeHeight*2+cylindHeight+0.30, ] ENDIF
! --- CONNECTIONS --- !
PARAMETERS MEP_NumberConnections = 3
! --- 1st CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 1 ConName = `Труба Впускного Соединения #1`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 1
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF ConWidth_1 > MIN(A/2-edgeThick-cylindRadius, B-edgeThick*2) THEN ConWidth_1 = MIN(A/2-edgeThick-cylindRadius, B-edgeThick*2) PARAMETERS ConWidth_1 = ConWidth_1 ENDIF IF ConWidth_1 < 0.001 THEN ConWidth_1 = 0.001 PARAMETERS ConWidth_1 = ConWidth_1 ENDIF VALUES "ConWidth_1" RANGE (0, MIN(A/2-edgeThick-cylindRadius, B-edgeThick*2)] PARAMETERS ConDepth_1 = ConWidth_1 HIDEPARAMETER "ConDepth_1" VALUES "ConLength_1" RANGE [0, ]
VALUES "ConPosX_1" RANGE [cylindRadius+ConWidth_1/2, A/2-ConWidth_1/2-edgeThick] VALUES "ConPosY_1" RANGE [-B/2+ConWidth_1/2+edgeThick, B/2-ConWidth_1/2-edgeThick] PARAMETERS ConPosZ_1 = ZZYZX-cylindHeight ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_1, ConPosY = ConPosY_1, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_1, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_1, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_1, ConWidth = ConWidth_1, ConDepth = ConDepth_1, ConLength = ConLength_1, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_1, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_1, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_1, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_1, ConToolType = ConToolType_1, ConStatus = ConStatus_1, ConType_1 = ConType_1, ConConnectorType_1 = ConConnectorType_1, ConSystem_1 = ConSystem_1, ui_page_idx = ui_page_idx, ui_current_con = ui_current_con, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_1, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 2nd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 2 ConName = `Труба Впускного Соединения #2`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = 0 ConDVecZ = 1
ConWVecX = -1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF ConWidth_2 > MIN(A/2-edgeThick-cylindRadius, B-edgeThick*2) THEN ConWidth_2 = MIN(A/2-edgeThick-cylindRadius, B-edgeThick*2) PARAMETERS ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 ENDIF IF ConWidth_2 < 0.001 THEN ConWidth_2 = 0.001 PARAMETERS ConWidth_2 = ConWidth_2 ENDIF VALUES "ConWidth_2" RANGE (0, MIN(A/2-edgeThick-cylindRadius, B-edgeThick*2)] PARAMETERS ConDepth_2 = ConWidth_2 HIDEPARAMETER "ConDepth_2" VALUES "ConLength_2" RANGE [0, ]
VALUES "ConPosX_2" RANGE [-A/2+ConWidth_2/2+edgeThick, -cylindRadius-ConWidth_2/2] VALUES "ConPosY_2" RANGE [-B/2+ConWidth_2/2+edgeThick, B/2-ConWidth_2/2-edgeThick] PARAMETERS ConPosZ_2 = ZZYZX-cylindHeight ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_2, ConPosY = ConPosY_2, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_2, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_2, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_2, ConWidth = ConWidth_2, ConDepth = ConDepth_2, ConLength = ConLength_2, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_2, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_2, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_2, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_2, ConToolType = ConToolType_2, ConStatus = ConStatus_2, ConType_2 = ConType_2, ConConnectorType_2 = ConConnectorType_2, ConSystem_2 = ConSystem_2, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_2, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
! --- 3rd CONNECTION --- !
ConID = 3 ConName = `Труба Соединения Дренажа`
ConDVecX = 0 ConDVecY = -1 ConDVecZ = 0
ConWVecX = 1 ConWVecY = 0 ConWVecZ = 0
IF NOT(SetProgram) THEN IF ConWidth_3 > toeHeight THEN ConWidth_3 = toeHeight VALUES "ConWidth_3" RANGE (0, toeHeight] PARAMETERS ConDepth_3 = ConWidth_3 HIDEPARAMETER "ConDepth_3" VALUES "ConLength_3" RANGE [0, ]
VALUES "ConPosX_3" RANGE [-A/2+ConWidth_3/2+edgeThick, A/2-ConWidth_3/2-edgeThick] PARAMETERS ConPosY_3 = -B/2+edgeThick PARAMETERS ConPosZ_3 = toeHeight/2 ENDIF
CALL "MEP_m_ConnectionsMEP_4" PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram, gs_Connections = gs_Connections, MEP_NumConnectionData = MEP_NumConnectionData, MEP_StrConnectionData = MEP_StrConnectionData, MEP_NumberConnections = MEP_NumberConnections, gs_AddConnections = gs_AddConnections, ConName = ConName, ConID = ConID, ConPosX = ConPosX_3, ConPosY = ConPosY_3, ConPosZ = ConPosZ_3, ConDVecX = ConDVecX, ConDVecY = ConDVecY, ConDVecZ = ConDVecZ, ConWVecX = ConWVecX, ConWVecY = ConWVecY, ConWVecZ = ConWVecZ,
ConNominalWidth = ConNominalWidth_3, ConNominalDepth = ConNominalDepth_3, ConWidth = ConWidth_3, ConDepth = ConDepth_3, ConLength = ConLength_3, ConWallThickness = ConWallThickness_3, ConConnectorWidth = ConConnectorWidth_3, ConConnectorDepth = ConConnectorDepth_3, ConConnectorWidth2 = ConConnectorWidth2_3, ConToolType = ConToolType_3, ConStatus = ConStatus_3, ConType_3 = ConType_3, ConConnectorType_3 = ConConnectorType_3, ConSystem_3 = ConSystem_3, shape_typ_to_validation = shape_typ_to_validation, MEP_enabled_geometry_mod = 1, bUIConnectionStatusCheckbox = 1
PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][1] = STR(ConToolType_3, 1, 0) PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][2] = ConName PARAMETERS MEP_ConInfo[ConID][3] = "0"
IF setProgram THEN SetProgram = 0 PARAMETERS SetProgram = SetProgram ENDIF
